query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_products,
  SUM(CASE WHEN description IS NOT NULL AND description != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as with_description,
  SUM(CASE WHEN specifications IS NOT NULL AND JSON_LENGTH(specifications) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as with_specifications,
  SUM(CASE WHEN catalogUrl IS NOT NULL AND catalogUrl != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as with_url,
  SUM(CASE WHEN descriptionQuality IN ('high', 'medium') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as quality_descriptions
FROM products 
WHERE brand = 'Thermo Fisher Scientific';

  SUM(CASE WHEN description IS NOT NULL AND description != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as with_description,
  SUM(CASE WHEN specifications IS NOT NULL AND JSON_LENGTH(specifications) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as with_specifications,
  SUM(CASE WHEN catalogUrl IS NOT NULL AND catalogUrl != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as with_url,
  SUM(CASE WHEN descriptionQuality IN ('high', 'medium') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as quality_descriptions
FROM products 
WHERE brand = 'Thermo Fisher Scientific';
